summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1611, for the improvement of 11th Avenue Northwest in the City of Seattle from West 70th Street to West 85th Street, by constructing water mains of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 17174 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
